title: fried broccoli florets
description: Pine nuts add crunch to homemade gnocchi served in a creamy sauce. Drop the deep-fried broccoli to make an easy midweek meal.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz King Edward potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
40g/1½oz parmesan cheese (or a similar vegetarian hard cheese), finely grated
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 small broccoli head, cut into small florets, blanched and refreshed
